title: UMCG Scale Colours — scale_colour_umcg
text: ggplot2 helpers add organisational colours ggplot objects.

title: UMCG Scale Colours — scale_colour_umcg
text: ... arguments passed ggplot2::scale_colour_manual() ggplot2::scale_fill_manual() n Number colours required.

title: UMCG Scale Colours — scale_colour_umcg
code: library(ggplot2)  mtcars |>   ggplot(aes(x = hp,              y = mpg,              colour = as.factor(vs)),              fill = as.factor(vs)) +   geom_point(size = 3) +   scale_colour_umcg(n = 3)   mtcars |>   ggplot(aes(x = hp,              y = mpg,              colour = as.factor(vs),              fill = as.factor(vs))) +   geom_point() +   geom_smooth(method="lm") +   scale_colour_umcg(n = 2) +   scale_fill_umcg(n = 2) +   labs(title = "Non-UMCG-styled plot") #> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'   # With plot2(), this all goes automatically with less code mtcars |>   plot2(hp, mpg, as.factor(vs),         title = "UMCG-styled plot",         subtitle = "(with the right font too; 'Outfit' from Google Fonts)") |>   add_smooth(method = "lm") #> ℹ Using type = "point" since both axes are numeric #> ✖ Package 'showtext' and 'showtextdb' and 'sysfonts' not installed, ignoring #> font = "Outfit" #> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
